title: TOEIC Listening and Reading Test 2
description: The TOEIC Listening and Reading test is a valid assessment of English-language reading and listening skills for the workplace. Employers worldwide use the TOEIC test to determine who can communicate effectively in English across borders and cultures with coworkers and clients.
author: ETS TOEIC

070d2b09-e8e7-467d-a340-add00435fad9.title: Part 1: Photographs
070d2b09-e8e7-467d-a340-add00435fad9.directions: You will see a photograph in your test book and you will hear four statements. You will have to choose the statement that best describes the photograph. There are 6 photographs and 6 statements in this part.

b85d83d7-4a73-4f8e-978d-728ed09f0be3.question: This is question 2
b85d83d7-4a73-4f8e-978d-728ed09f0be3.direction: Choose the best description of the photograph.
